#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

int main() {
  int t;
  cin >> t;
  while (t--) {
    string s;
    cin >> s;
    int n = s.size();
    vector<int> a(n + 1, 0), b(n + 1, 0);
    for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
      a[i + 1] = a[i] + int(s[i] == 'N');
    }
    for (int i = n - 1; i >= 0; --i) {
      b[i] = b[i + 1] + int(s[i] == 'O');
    }
    int ans = n + 3;
    for (int i = 0; i <= n; ++i) {
      ans = min(ans, a[i] + b[i]);
    }
    cout << ans << endl;
  }
}
